import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Student1 from "../images/student1.png"; import Student2 from "../images/student2.png"; import '../css/shared_css/navbar.css'; import '../css/shared_css/footer.css'; import '../css/about.css'; function About() { // state for the drop-down menu on phone view const [showMenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false); // state for the social media icons const [socialMedia, setSocialMedia] = useState({ facebook: "https://www.facebook.com/groups/LibertyCFL/?_ga=2.101789572.488967955.1669654119-816072560.1565226602", twitter: "https://twitter.com/LibertyU_Busi?_ga=2.101985156.488967955.1669654119-816072560.1565226602", instagram: "https://www.instagram.com/lucenterforfinancialliteracy/?_ga=2.268035211.488967955.1669654119-816072560.1565226602", linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/company/center-for-financial-literacy-liberty-university/?viewAsMember=true" }); // function to show/hide the drop-down menu const toggleMenu = () => { setShowMenu(!showMenu); } // function to redirect to the CFL website const goToCFLPage = () => { window.location.href = "https://www.liberty.edu/business/center-for-financial-literacy/"; } // function to redirect to social media pages const goToSocialMedia = (page) => { window.location.href = socialMedia[page]; } return (
